EMPUZZLES.CreateSwitchDesc: Interactive switch with ON/OFF states and variable tracking
EMPUZZLES.CreateResetTileDesc: Reset tiles, variables, and states back to their initial values
EMPUZZLES.CreateLightDesc: Toggleable light source with click or darkness trigger
EMPUZZLES.CreateTeleportDesc: Teleport tile that moves tokens to another location or scene
EMPUZZLES.TileImageHint: The image for this trap tile
EMPUZZLES.CustomTagsHint: Add custom tags for organizing tiles. An auto-generated tag (e.g., EM-Teleport-001) will also be applied after creation for tile management.
EMPUZZLES.HiddenTileHint: When checked, the tile will be hidden from players
EMPUZZLES.TargetSceneHint: The scene where the teleport destination is located
EMPUZZLES.SelectPositionHint: Click the button and then click on the canvas to select a teleport destination
EMPUZZLES.CrossSceneTeleportWarningHint: A Gamemaster user must be logged in for cross-scene teleportation to work.
EMPUZZLES.DeleteSourceTokenHint: When teleporting to a different scene, delete the token at the source location.
EMPUZZLES.DeleteSourceCombatWarningHint: Using Delete Source Token during combat will corrupt the initiative tracker. The initiative is tied to the original token, which will be deleted. Avoid using this option during active combat encounters.
EMPUZZLES.CreateReturnTeleportHint: Automatically create a 1x1 return teleport tile at the destination that brings tokens back to this location with the same settings
EMPUZZLES.CreateTrapDesc: Create trap tiles with damage, teleport, effects, or activate other tiles
EMPUZZLES.TrapTypeHint: Choose between an image-based trap or a trap that activates other tiles
EMPUZZLES.ImageBehaviorHint: Choose what happens to the trap tile when triggered
EMPUZZLES.CreateDisappearingTrapDesc: Trap tile that disappears when triggered
EMPUZZLES.CreateSwitchingTrapDesc: Trap tile that switches to a triggered image
EMPUZZLES.CreateActivatingTrapDesc: Trap tile that activates other selected tiles
EMPUZZLES.CreateCombatTrapDesc: Trap tile that makes attack rolls against targets
EMPUZZLES.DMGTrapDropZone: Drag a DMG trap item here from a compendium
EMPUZZLES.DMGTrapItemHint: Drag a trap equipment item from a compendium (e.g., Poisoned Darts, Collapsing Roof) to automatically populate saving throw and damage fields based on level range
EMPUZZLES.DMGTrapActivatingHint: Drag a trap equipment item from a compendium to automatically populate saving throw fields for this activating trap
EMPUZZLES.CombatTrapStartingImageHint: The tile image before the trap is triggered (leave blank for hidden trap)
EMPUZZLES.AttackItemHint: Drag a weapon or feature from a compendium to use for this trap's attacks
EMPUZZLES.TokenVisibleHint: When checked, the trap will have a visible token on the map. When unchecked, the token will be hidden.
EMPUZZLES.TokenImageHint: Custom image for the trap's token (only used if token is visible)
EMPUZZLES.NoTokenPositionSelected: No position selected. The token will be placed at the tile location. Click the button to set a custom position.
EMPUZZLES.MaxTriggersHint: Number of times this trap can trigger (0 = unlimited, 1 = once, 2+ = that many times)
EMPUZZLES.TrapNameHint: A descriptive name for this trap tile
EMPUZZLES.StartingImageHint: The tile image before the trap is triggered
EMPUZZLES.HideTrapOnTriggerHint: When checked, the trap tile will be hidden after triggering instead of showing a triggered image
EMPUZZLES.TriggeredImageHint: The tile image shown after the trap is triggered (only used if hide trap is not checked)
EMPUZZLES.MinRequiredHint: Minimum number of tokens required to trigger the trap
EMPUZZLES.TriggerLimitsHint: Minimum number of tokens required to trigger, and maximum number of times this trap can trigger (0 = unlimited)
EMPUZZLES.HasSavingThrowHint: When checked, targets must make a saving throw before the result is applied
EMPUZZLES.SavingThrowHint: The type of saving throw required to avoid the trap
EMPUZZLES.SavingThrowUnavailableHint: Install and enable Monk's Token Bar to use saving throw mechanics for traps and teleports. All other features will work without it.
EMPUZZLES.DCHint: The difficulty class for the saving throw
EMPUZZLES.DamageOnFailHint: Damage dealt to tokens that fail the saving throw (e.g., 2d6, 3d8+5)
EMPUZZLES.HalfDamageOnSuccessHint: Tokens that succeed on the saving throw take half damage (rounded down)
EMPUZZLES.HealFlavorTextPlaceholder: You feel a surge of healing energy!
EMPUZZLES.AdditionalEffectsHealHint: Select additional status effects to apply when healing is triggered
EMPUZZLES.FlavorTextHint: Descriptive text shown when the trap is triggered
EMPUZZLES.SoundHint: Sound effect played when the trap is triggered
EMPUZZLES.ResultTypeHint: The type of result that occurs when the trap is triggered
EMPUZZLES.TargetTypeHint: Who is affected by the trap result
EMPUZZLES.PauseGameOnTriggerHint: When checked, the game will pause when this tile triggers. Useful for important narrative moments or giving the GM time to react.
EMPUZZLES.DeactivateAfterTriggerHint: When checked, this trap will automatically deactivate after being triggered once, making it a one-time trap
EMPUZZLES.VisibilityVisibleHint: The trap tile is visible to all players from the start
EMPUZZLES.VisibilityHiddenHint: The trap tile is hidden from players initially
EMPUZZLES.OnTriggerStaysSameHint: Tile image stays the same when triggered
EMPUZZLES.OnTriggerSwitchesImageHint: Tile changes to a different image when triggered
EMPUZZLES.OnTriggerStaysHiddenHint: Tile stays hidden even after being triggered
EMPUZZLES.OnTriggerRevealsSameHint: Tile becomes visible when triggered, keeping the same image
EMPUZZLES.OnTriggerRevealsSwitchedHint: Tile becomes visible when triggered and changes to a different image
EMPUZZLES.AdditionalEffectsHint: Select additional status effects to apply when the trap is triggered (separate from result type)
EMPUZZLES.AdditionalEffectsDamageHint: Select additional status effects to apply on a failed saving throw
EMPUZZLES.AdditionalEffectsCombatHint: Select additional status effects to apply after the attack roll
EMPUZZLES.NoPositionSelected: No position selected. Click the button and then click on the canvas to select a teleport destination.
EMPUZZLES.EffectSelectHint: Select which status effect to apply from the available effects in your game system
EMPUZZLES.EffectActionHint: How to apply the effect (Add = apply, Remove = clear, Toggle = add or remove based on current state)
EMPUZZLES.DisappearingTrapImageHint: The tile image that will disappear when the trap is triggered
EMPUZZLES.ActivatingTrapTilesHint: Click Add Tile to select tiles from the canvas that will be activated when this trap is triggered
EMPUZZLES.VariableNameHint: Unique identifier for tracking this switch state
EMPUZZLES.TeleportSoundHint: Audio file to play when teleporting (leave blank for no sound)
EMPUZZLES.LightSoundHint: Audio file for ambient sound at light location (leave blank for no sound)
EMPUZZLES.SoundRadiusHint: The radius in grid units for the ambient sound attenuation
EMPUZZLES.SoundVolumeHint: The volume level for the ambient sound (0 = silent, 1 = full volume)
EMPUZZLES.UseDarknessTriggerHint: When enabled, the light will automatically activate based on scene darkness level instead of requiring a click
EMPUZZLES.DarknessMinimumHint: The minimum darkness level (0-1) at which the light will activate
EMPUZZLES.DimLightHint: The radius of dim light in grid units
EMPUZZLES.BrightLightHint: The radius of bright light in grid units
EMPUZZLES.LightColorHint: The color of the light (leave as #ffffff for white/natural light)
EMPUZZLES.ColorIntensityHint: The intensity/alpha of the light color (0 = transparent, 1 = opaque)
EMPUZZLES.UseOverlayHint: When enabled, an overlay tile (e.g., animated flame) will appear on top when the light is ON
EMPUZZLES.OverlayImageHint: The image or video for the overlay tile (typically an animated flame or glow effect)
EMPUZZLES.WallDoorActionsHint: Click Add Wall/Door to select walls or doors from the canvas to change their state
EMPUZZLES.NoWallsSelected: No walls/doors selected. Click "Add Wall/Door" to select walls or doors from the canvas.
EMPUZZLES.NoTilesSelected: No tiles selected. Click "Add Tile" to select tiles from the canvas.
EMPUZZLES.NoVariablesFound: No variables found in this scene.
EMPUZZLES.DeleteTileConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
EMPUZZLES.Name: Name
EMPUZZLES.CreateCheckStateTileDesc: State machine that checks variables and branches logic
EMPUZZLES.SelectTilesToMonitorHint: Choose tiles with variables that this state machine will check
EMPUZZLES.NoTilesWithVariables: No tiles with variables found on this scene
EMPUZZLES.TileNameHint: A descriptive name for this tile
EMPUZZLES.TileImageHint: The image displayed for this tile
EMPUZZLES.BranchesHint: Define conditional branches that execute actions when variable conditions are met. Branches are evaluated in order - first match wins.
EMPUZZLES.NoBranches: No branches defined. Branches allow you to execute actions based on variable conditions.
EMPUZZLES.NoConditions: No conditions. This branch will always match (default branch).
EMPUZZLES.SupportOnPatreon: Love this module? Please support me on Patreon!
EMPUZZLES.CreationTypeHint: Choose whether to create a Tile (uses Monk's Active Tiles) or a Region (uses FoundryVTT v13 native regions with Enhanced Region Behaviors)
EMPUZZLES.DamageOnSaveHint: Damage formula on successful save (leave empty for no damage on save)
EMPUZZLES.EnhancedRegionBehaviorsRequired: Enhanced Region Behaviors module required for native trap behaviors
EMPUZZLES.DeleteRegionConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
